name: Phantom Ally
text: Your phantom’s strength is fueled by your own diverse experiences and abilities.
benefit: The abilities of your phantom are calculated as though you were 4 class levels higher, to a maximum effective spiritualist level equal to your character level.
text_zh: 你拥有的力量与经验的每一点滴都会具象于跟随你的魅影之上。
benefit_zh: 你的魅影拥有的能力视为你在拥有魅影职业能力的职业等级上增加4级，最高不超过你的角色等级。
